title: Is it too much to ask to be able to buy hextech keys with IP?

replies.body:
Yes dude.

You're getting FREE SKINS already with hextech chests. The keys are there to limit chests openings to 1 a month for free players. 

If you wanted to get more 'free' skins, they'll charge a premium. Its just fair.

Edit: sorry I messed up how many chests you can open per month.

..1 a month? What?

I get about 5-6 keys a month..
You mean fragments? Cause it should be locker at 12 fragments/4keys a month

free skins that i never actually get because i very rarely get enough keys to open the chests. 

It's more effective to actually give people a pricey skin then just not give them anything. I got omega squad teemo from a free chest then spent 20$ to actually get it.
I open like 4 chests per month. thats at least 1 free skin worth 10 bucks. Just try winning more games, I get keys really easily.
i open probably 3 boxes a month, and get about 2.5 champion shards.
Egh, not gonna argue with you there. I have every single 450IP champ shard. Waste of chests eh?
You can get up to 12 key fragments per Month not 3
I have like 7 keys and no boxes. :(
got a lot of boxes and  no keys.
I'd actually like to be able to get more chests, I've gotten them on my mains but that was it. 2 boxes WOO 38 key frags ._.
